mapper.select: select * from users order by joinDate desc
mapper.insert: insert into users values(#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_address}, #{user_birth}, #{user_phone}, sysdate, '프로필 이미지')
mapper.update: update users set user_pw=#{user_pw}, user_name=#{user_name}, user_email=#{user_email}, user_address=#{user_address}, user_birth=#{user_birth}, user_phone=#{user_phone}, profileimg=#{profileimg} where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select * from users where user_id=#{user_id} and user_pw=#{user_pw}
select user_id from users where user_name=#{user_name} and user_email=#{user_email}
select user_pw from users where user_id=#{user_id} and user_email=#{user_email}
